headline: Singapore Colocation Data Center Portfolio Analysis Report 2025-2028: Existing & Upcoming White-Floor Space, Current and Future IT Load Capacity, Wholesale and Retail Colocation Pricing
summary: Explore Singapore's dynamic data center market with our comprehensive database analysis. Delve into detailed insights of 44 existing and 6 upcoming data centers across Eastern, Southern, Northern, and Western Singapore. Discover current and future IT load capacities, white-floor space metrics, and retail colocation pricing for varying rack sizes. headline: Germany Data Center Colocation Market Supply & Demand Analysis Report 2025: A $5.36 Billion Industry by 2030 with Frankfurt Leading the Charge in Data Center Operations
summary: The Germany Data Center Colocation Market is poised for significant growth, valued at USD 2.37 billion in 2024 and projected to reach USD 5.36 billion by 2030, a robust CAGR of 14.57%. As a major data center hub in Europe, Germany hosts 187 existing facilities, with Frankfurt leading the charge in data center operations. headline: Africa Colocation Data Center Portfolio Report 2025-2028: Detailed Analysis of 125 existing data centers, 46 upcoming data centers, and 54 Major Operators/Investors
summary: Explore the comprehensive Africa Data Center Market Portfolio Analysis database, offering in-depth insights into 125 existing and 46 upcoming colocation data centers across key African nations including South Africa, Nigeria, Kenya, and Egypt.
